comm

Interface I_PCDI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PCD_Interface

    public interface I_PCDI
    I_PCDI

    this is the interface for the pcdi class. It makes it possible to handle requests from the upper layer (user/gui usually)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearBuffers()
      this method clears the send and receivebuffers
      void connect()
      this method is used to open the connection to the device
      void disconnect()
      this method is used to close the connection to the device
      void getParameterInfo(int valueNr, int deviceId)
      this method makes it possible to request parameter info of a parameter by value number
      boolean isConnected()
      get information wether the communication is active
      void readParameter(int valueNr, int deviceId)
      this method makes it possible to request parameter value of a parameter by value number
      void registerListener(I_PCDI_Listener listener)
      this method is used to register the listener
      void sendCommand(PCDI_COMMANDS command, int deviceId)
      this method makes it possible to send commands.
      void startOscilloscope(PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_COMMAND osci_cmd, int valNr1, int valNr2, int valNr3, int valNr4, int valNr5, int valNr6, int valNr7, int oversampling, int deviceId)
      this method initiates a start of the oscilloscope-recording
      void unregisterListener(I_PCDI_Listener listener)
      this method is used to unregister the listener
      void writeParameter(PCDI_Parameter<?> param, int deviceId)
      this method makes it possible to write a parameter value in the device

    • Method Detail

      • getParameterInfo

        void getParameterInfo(int valueNr,
                      int deviceId)
        this method makes it possible to request parameter info of a parameter by value number
        Parameters:
        valueNr - is the value number of the requested parameter
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • readParameter

        void readParameter(int valueNr,
                   int deviceId)
        this method makes it possible to request parameter value of a parameter by value number
        Parameters:
        valueNr - is the value number of the requested parameter
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • writeParameter

        void writeParameter(PCDI_Parameter<?> param,
                    int deviceId)
        this method makes it possible to write a parameter value in the device
        Parameters:
        param - the parameter with the desired value
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • sendCommand

        void sendCommand(PCDI_COMMANDS command,
                 int deviceId)
        this method makes it possible to send commands.
        Parameters:
        command - the desired command to execute by the device
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • startOscilloscope

        void startOscilloscope(PCDI_OSCILLOSCOPE_COMMAND osci_cmd,
                       int valNr1,
                       int valNr2,
                       int valNr3,
                       int valNr4,
                       int valNr5,
                       int valNr6,
                       int valNr7,
                       int oversampling,
                       int deviceId)
        this method initiates a start of the oscilloscope-recording
        Parameters:
        osci_cmd - wether to only start the osci or additionally enable a controller
        valNr1 - the value number of the desired recording parameter1
        valNr2 - the value number of the desired recording parameter2
        valNr3 - the value number of the desired recording parameter3
        valNr4 - the value number of the desired recording parameter4
        valNr5 - the value number of the desired recording parameter5
        valNr6 - the value number of the desired recording parameter6
        valNr7 - the value number of the desired recording parameter7
        oversampling - factor to not use every timestep to sample
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device

      • registerListener

        void registerListener(I_PCDI_Listener listener)
        this method is used to register the listener
        Parameters:
        listener - ist the listener to register

      • clearBuffers

        void clearBuffers()
        this method clears the send and receivebuffers

      • unregisterListener

        void unregisterListener(I_PCDI_Listener listener)
        this method is used to unregister the listener
        Parameters:
        listener - ist the listener to unregister

      • connect

        void connect()
        this method is used to open the connection to the device

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        this method is used to close the connection to the device

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        get information wether the communication is active
        Returns:
        state of connection
